given.text: Mouadh is very active and determined student. one the best of those I have ever monitored. Good luck!

received.text:
I rarely come across real talents who stand out like Bader. 

I had the pleasure of working with Bader for serval projects. 

Bader’s ability to handle multiple projects was unlike any I’ve seen before and made a dramatic increase in the productivity level of our work.

No matter how tense a meeting, Bader made sure everyone left with a smile. 

... Voir plus

I rarely come across real talents who stand out like Riheb. 

I had the pleasure of working with Riheb for two years at the AIESEC organisation, collaborating on several project teams.

Riheb’s ability to handle multiple projects was unlike any I’ve seen before and made a dramatic increase in the productivity level of our organisation.

Oh, and she made sure our weekly staff meetings were never without donuts and coffee. Talk about motivating a team!
No matter how tense a meeting, Riheb made sure everyone left with a smile.
